title: Design review: 1-1 chats (chat view)
body:
- [ ] 1. Long names are not handled - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510047182)  
- [ ] 2. Wrong margin between list items - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510226396)  
- [ ] 3. The badge is not aligned with  date and hour  and name - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511306952)  
- [ ] 4. Unread barge may overlap with text - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511306759) 
- [ ] 5. Missing counter border - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510044277)  
- [ ] 6. + uses outdated color - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510043895)  
- [ ] 7. Unmute icon may overlap with date - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510042990)
